title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
Fry the pancetta until crispy.
Beat eggs in a bowl, add grated parmesan and pepper.
Drain pasta, mix with pancetta and remove from heat.
Stir in egg mixture quickly to avoid scrambling.
Serve with extra parmesan.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken with tikka masala paste and grill until cooked.
Sauté onions until golden.
Add tomatoes and spices, simmer for 10 minutes.
Stir in cream and add chicken pieces.
Simmer for 5 more minutes and serve with rice.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: A quick and healthy stir fry with mixed vegetables and soy sauce.
instructions: Heat olive oil in a pan.
Add garlic and ginger, sauté for a minute.
Add broccoli, bell pepper, and carrot, stir fry for 5 minutes.
Pour in soy sauce and cook for another 2 minutes.
Serve hot with rice or noodles.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
summary: Classic cookies with chocolate chips, perfect for a sweet treat.
instructions: Preheat oven to 180°C (350°F).
Cream butter and sugar together.
Beat in the egg and vanilla extract.
Fold in flour and chocolate chips.
Scoop onto a baking tray and bake for 10-12 minutes.
Cool on a wire rack before serving.

title: Caesar Salad
summary: A fresh salad with romaine lettuce, croutons, and Caesar dressing.
instructions: Wash and chop the romaine lettuce.
In a bowl, combine lettuce, croutons, and parmesan.
Drizzle with Caesar dressing and toss gently.
Season with black pepper and serve immediately.

title: Beef Tacos
summary: Tasty tacos filled with seasoned ground beef and fresh toppings.
instructions: Cook ground beef in a pan until browned.
Add taco seasoning and water, simmer for 5 minutes.
Fill taco shells with beef mixture.
Top with lettuce, tomato, cheese, and sour cream.
Serve immediately.

title: Pancakes
summary: Fluffy pancakes served with maple syrup and fresh fruits.
instructions: In a bowl, mix flour, sugar, and baking powder.
In another bowl, whisk egg and milk together.
Combine wet and dry ingredients until smooth.
Heat butter in a pan, pour batter to form pancakes.
Cook until bubbles form, flip and cook until golden.
Serve with maple syrup and fruits.

title: Greek Salad
summary: A refreshing salad with cucumbers, tomatoes, olives, and feta cheese.
instructions: Combine cucumber, tomatoes, olives, and feta in a bowl.
Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with oregano.
Toss gently and serve chilled.

title: Lentil Soup
summary: A hearty soup made with lentils, vegetables, and spices.
instructions: Rinse lentils and set aside.
In a pot, sauté onion, carrots, and celery until soft.
Add lentils, water, cumin, salt, and pepper.
Bring to a boil, then simmer for 30 minutes.
Blend if desired for a smoother texture.

title: Mushroom Risotto
summary: Creamy risotto with mushrooms and parmesan cheese.
instructions: Heat butter in a pan, sauté onion until translucent.
Add mushrooms and cook until soft.
Stir in Arborio rice, cook for 2 minutes.
Gradually add broth, stirring constantly until absorbed.
Finish with parmesan cheese and serve hot.
